description: Have total control with the RCA RCRC36BGR Value Remotes Combo Pack with 6 and 3 Function URCs. With two ergonomically designed remotes included, you can comfortably control your TV with the touch of a finger. Both include auto code search, menu and guide support, and volume, brand/manual code searches and direct code entry, and transport key punch-through. Control your TV, SAT/CBL, and DVD/VCR.  Plus, one of the remotes allows you to control DVR/AUX1, AUX2, and AUDIO with skip forward, skip back, and slow motion controls.
title: RCA RCRC36BGR Combo Pack with 6 and 3 Function Univerasal Remote Control
